title_en: M4Human: A Large-Scale Multimodal mmWave Radar Benchmark for Human Mesh Reconstruction
title_zh: M4Human：用于人体网格重建的大规模多模态毫米波雷达基准数据集
summary_en: Human mesh reconstruction (HMR) provides direct insights into body-environment interaction, which enables various immersive applications. While existing large-scale HMR datasets rely heavily on line-of-sight RGB input, vision-based sensing is limited by occlusion, lighting variation, and privacy concerns. To overcome these limitations, recent efforts have explored radio-frequency (RF) mmWave radar for privacy-preserving indoor human sensing. However, current radar datasets are constrained by sparse skeleton labels, limited scale, and simple in-place actions. To advance the HMR research community, we introduce M4Human, the current largest-scale (661K-frame) ($9\times$ prior largest) multimodal benchmark, featuring high-resolution mmWave radar, RGB, and depth data. M4Human provides both raw radar tensors (RT) and processed radar point clouds (RPC) to enable research across different levels of RF signal granularity. M4Human includes high-quality motion capture (MoCap) annotations with 3D meshes and global trajectories, and spans 20 subjects and 50 diverse actions, including in-place, sit-in-place, and free-space sports or rehabilitation movements. We establish benchmarks on both RT and RPC modalities, as well as multimodal fusion with RGB-D modalities. Extensive results highlight the significance of M4Human for radar-based human modeling while revealing persistent challenges under fast, unconstrained motion. The dataset and code will be released after the paper publication.
summary_zh: 人体网格重建能够直接揭示人体与环境的交互关系，从而赋能多种沉浸式应用。现有的大规模人体网格重建数据集严重依赖视距内的RGB输入，而基于视觉的感知技术受限于遮挡、光照变化及隐私问题。为克服这些局限，近期研究开始探索利用射频毫米波雷达实现保护隐私的室内人体感知。然而，当前的雷达数据集受限于稀疏的骨架标注、有限的规模以及简单的原地动作。为推进人体网格重建研究领域的发展，我们提出了M4Human——当前规模最大（66.1万帧，是此前最大数据集的9倍）的多模态基准数据集，包含高分辨率毫米波雷达、RGB及深度数据。M4Human同时提供原始雷达张量与处理后雷达点云数据，以支持不同粒度射频信号层面的研究。该数据集包含带有三维网格和全局轨迹的高质量动作捕捉标注，涵盖20名受试者和50种多样化动作，包括原地动作、原地坐姿动作以及自由空间中的运动或康复动作。我们分别在雷达张量与雷达点云模态上建立了基准测试，并实现了与RGB-D模态的多模态融合。大量实验结果凸显了M4Human对基于雷达的人体建模研究的重要意义，同时也揭示了在快速、无约束运动下仍存在的持续挑战。数据集与代码将在论文发表后公开。
